title: Retrieve details about volume plans and job packs
description: Retrieves fee information for job products including Job Packs and Volume Plans Specifically information that does not relate to purchasing a specfic listing
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

returns.description: <JobsFees> A JobsFees containing details about Job Packs and Volume Plans

fields.name: JobPacks
fields.description: A collection of all available job packs

fields.name: Id
fields.type:
Id 
 Integer 

The id of the product



 Size 
 Integer 

The number of listings provided by the product



 Price 
 Number 

The cost of the product excluding GST



 Duration 
 String or null 

A description of the duration of the product



 AddOns 
 Collection of <AddOn> or null 

A collection of add-ons available for this product






 Name 
 String or null 

The name of the add-on



 Price 
 Number or null 

The price of an add-on






 RequiresExtendedStatus 
 Boolean 

Requires the purchaser to be a agent with extended job pack status enabled
